data.text: @DurhamHealthNC @CityofDurhamNC @CDCgov Because there’s no movement of people between Wake county to the east without mask mandate or the entire state for that matter. Yes, let’s keep this up Durham. Love wearing my mask to walk 20 feet into crowded bar to take it off for following 2 hours. Gross progressive posturing

@DurhamHealthNC @CDCgov According to the data on the DPH website Durham should be yellow with 7 day case rate <200 (104); 7 day hospital admissions at 18 and 7 day % beds used at 11.6 Just curious about the discrepancy
@DurhamHealthNC @CDCgov The last WWII Japanese soldier didn’t surrender until 1974 - you can break the record, Durham!!

El CDC ha creado un recurso para ver los niveles de COVID en la comunidad. El recurso clasifica los condados y recomienda medidas de prevención de COVID. Durham es un área de alta transmisión; se recomienda usar máscaras, probarse y vacunarse. Más: https://t.co/KX8ExvNFki https://t.co/ciY4aU6OkB
